tool.name: FidoAdapter
tool.description: Runs the protein inference engine Fido.
tool.command:
FidoAdapter
#if $param_in: -in $param_in #end if #if $param_out: -out $param_out #end if #if $param_fido_executable: -fido_executable $param_fido_executable #end if #if $param_fidocp_executable: -fidocp_executable $param_fidocp_executable #end if #if $param_separate_runs: -separate_runs #end if #if $param_greedy_group_resolution: -greedy_group_resolution #end if #if $param_no_cleanup: -no_cleanup #end if #if $param_all_PSMs: -all_PSMs #end if #if $param_group_level: -group_level #end if #if $param_log2_states: -log2_states $param_log2_states #end if #if $param_threads: -threads $param_threads #end if #if $param_prob_protein: -prob:protein $param_prob_protein #end if #if $param_prob_peptide: -prob:peptide $param_prob_peptide #end if #if $param_prob_spurious: -prob:spurious $param_prob_spurious #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_version: -version "$adv_opts.param_version" #end if #if $adv_opts.param_keep_zero_group: -keep_zero_group #end if #if $adv_opts.param_accuracy: -accuracy #if " " in str($adv_opts.param_accuracy): "$adv_opts.param_accuracy" #else $adv_opts.param_accuracy #end if #end if #if $adv_opts.param_log2_states_precalc: -log2_states_precalc $adv_opts.param_log2_states_precalc #end if #if $adv_opts.param_log: -log "$adv_opts.param_log" #end if #if $adv_opts.param_debug: -debug $adv_opts.param_debug #end if #if $adv_opts.param_no_progress: -no_progress #end if #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #end if #if $adv_opts.param_test: -test #end if #end if

param.name: param_in
param.label: Input: identification results

param.name: param_fido_executable
param.label: Path to the Fido executable to use; may be empty if the executable is globally available

param.name: param_fidocp_executable
param.label: Path to the FidoChooseParameters executable to use; may be empty if the executable is globally available

param.name: param_separate_runs
param.label: Process multiple protein identification runs in the input separately, don't merge them
param.help: (-separate_runs) Merging results in loss of descriptive information of the single protein identification runs

param.name: param_greedy_group_resolution
param.label: Post-process Fido output with greedy resolution of shared peptides based on the protein probabilities
param.help: (-greedy_group_resolution) Also adds the resolved ambiguity groups to output

param.name: param_no_cleanup
param.label: Omit clean-up of peptide sequences (removal of non-letter characters, replacement of I with L)

param.name: param_all_PSMs
param.label: Consider all PSMs of each peptide, instead of only the best one

param.name: param_group_level
param.label: Perform inference on protein group level (instead of individual protein level)
param.help: (-group_level) This will lead to higher probabilities for (bigger) protein groups

param.name: param_log2_states
param.label: Binary logarithm of the max
param.help: (-log2_states) number of connected states in a subgraph. For a value N, subgraphs that are bigger than 2^N will be split up, sacrificing accuracy for runtime. '0' uses the default (18)

param.name: param_threads
param.label: Sets the number of threads allowed to be used by the TOPP tool

param.name: param_prob_protein
param.label: Protein prior probability ('gamma' parameter)

param.name: param_prob_peptide
param.label: Peptide emission probability ('alpha' parameter)

param.name: param_prob_spurious
param.label: Spurious peptide identification probability ('beta' parameter)

param.name: param_version
param.label: Version of the tool that generated this parameters file

param.name: param_keep_zero_group
param.label: Keep the group of proteins with estimated probability of zero, which is otherwise removed (it may be very large)

param.name: param_accuracy
param.label: Accuracy level of start parameters
param.help: (-accuracy) There is a trade-off between accuracy and runtime. Empty uses the default ('best')

param.name: param_log2_states_precalc
param.label: Like 'log2_states', but allows to set a separate limit for the precalculation

param.name: param_log
param.label: Name of log file (created only when specified)

param.name: param_debug
param.label: Sets the debug level

param.name: param_no_progress
param.label: Disables progress logging to command line

param.name: param_force
param.label: Overwrite tool specific checks

param.name: param_test
param.label: Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

tool.help:
Runs the protein inference engine Fido.
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/TOPP_FidoAdapter.html
